title: List of Athletic Bilbao records and statistics
text:
<a href="Athletic%20Bilbao">Athletic Bilbao</a> is a Spanish <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club. This article contains historical and current statistics and records pertaining to the club.
Extended honours.
Titles.
(*) International friendly tournaments not included.
Players.
Games only include professional matches. Substitute appearances are included. Statistics for current players are updated continuously throughout the year. Players are listed according to the date of their first-team debut for the club.
Player league records.
Pichichi winners.
The <a href="Pichichi%20Trophy">Pichichi Trophy</a> is an award given by the Spanish newspaper "<a href="Marca%20%28newspaper%29">Marca</a>" to the top scorer at the end of the league season.
Ricardo Zamora Trophy.
The <a href="Ricardo%20Zamora%20Trophy">Ricardo Zamora Trophy</a> is an award established by Spanish newspaper "<a href="Marca%20%28newspaper%29">Marca</a>" in 1958. The award goes to the goalkeeper who has the lowest "goals-to-games" ratio. The list also includes retrospective winners under the same rules before the trophy was introduced.
Zarra Trophy.
The <a href="Zarra%20Trophy">Zarra Trophy</a> is an award established by Spanish newspaper "<a href="Marca%20%28newspaper%29">Marca</a>" in 2006. The award goes to the top scorer of <a href="Spain%20national%20football%20team">Spanish nationality</a> (born or acquired). The list also includes retrospective winners under the same rules before the trophy was introduced.
